abstract: National networks tested an online exchange designed by eBay to sell advertising time and decided that it went too far in removing humans from the ad sales process.
snippet: National networks tested an online exchange designed by eBay to sell advertising time and decided that it went too far in removing humans from the ad sales process.
lead_paragraph: Auctions on eBay may be adored by millions of consumers around the world, but the large cable television networks have decided they want nothing to do with them.

headline.main: For Cable TV, No Interest in Selling Ads the eBay Way
headline.print_headline: For Cable TV, No Interest In Selling Ads The eBay Way
